DonationHero.title: A Gesture, An Opportunity Together to Support Education
DonationHero.description: The donations page is a space where donors and beneficiaries meet through intermediary organizations. Donors can offer books, school supplies, and educational materials, while those in need can contact these organizations for help. This initiative promotes solidarity, simplifies donation logistics, and ensures equitable distribution of resources through responsible partnerships.
